import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from './Button'; function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const [button, setBotton] = useState(true); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMobleMenu = () => setClick(false); const showButton = () => { if(window.innerWidth <= 960) { setBotton(false) } else { setBotton(true) } } return ( <>
